sentence.Network_en: This last consignment of hosiery is quite up to standard.

entry.def: You use hosiery to refer to tights, stockings, and socks, especially when they are on sale in shops.

means.word_mean: 1. socks and stockings and tights collectively (the British include underwear as hosiery)
